title: ST_Envelope_Agg
description: An aggregate function that returns the collective bounding box (envelope) of a set of geometries.
kernels:
  - returns: geometry
    args: [geometry]
---

## Description

An aggregate function that computes the collective bounding box (envelope) of all geometries in a group.

## Examples

```sql
SELECT ST_Envelope_Agg(geom) FROM (
    VALUES
        (ST_Point(0, 0)),
        (ST_Point(5, 5)),
        (ST_Point(10, 2))
) AS t(geom);
```
